title: Interactive Narrative
description: Examines significant examples of this emerging genre, including its roots ini experimental uses of older media, and engages students in creating their own interactive narrative.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 1322 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (LMC 2700 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or LMC 2000 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
